text: @realDonaldTrump NO world leaders got sick with this Coronavirus and died!  People, Analyze what you hear! Analyze what you watch!  Analyze what you read! Stop with the desensitizing ! TESTS, we have enough deaths! Enough of this EUGENICS BULL!
